entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
